-- | Iteratee interface to SamTools library
--   
--   Iteratee interface to SamTools library
@package samtools-iteratee
@version 0.2.2

module Bio.SamTools.Iteratee
enumInHandle :: InHandle -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumTam :: FilePath -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumTamWithIndex :: FilePath -> FilePath -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumBam :: FilePath -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumQuery :: Query -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumIndexRegion :: IdxHandle -> Int -> (Int64, Int64) -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
enumBamRegion :: FilePath -> ByteString -> (Int64, Int64) -> Enumerator [Bam1] IO a
